Package companyappointmentmanagementsystem.controller

Class BaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • companyappointmentmanagementsystem.controller.BaseController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppointmentInputController, CustomerInputController, DateTimeInputController, GeneratedReportOutputController, LogInController, MainController, ReportParameterInputController
    public abstract class BaseController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Base class for all controller class. The class contains useful methods from loading fxml to showing in a window. Never set the controller value in fxml otherwise it will throw exception.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected BaseController()
      Constructor method to create the controller and show the new view in a new window
      protected BaseController​(javafx.stage.Stage window)
      Constructor method to create the controller and show the new view in an existing window.
